content: crochet guinness dog toy by ann mcclure 1 of 2 crochet guinness dog toy by creative commons attribution-noncommercial-share alike 3 0 license size half pint materials yarn worsted weight black 49 yards approximately worsted weight white 22 yards approximately hook h 5 0 mm stuffing gauge 15 double_crochet and 7 rounds = 4 inches notes if you make it bigger you will need more yarn pattern is worked in continuous rounds do not join or turn work fpdc turns the corner and makes a ridge on the public side of the work if you don t want a ridge use bpdc instead bpdc turns the corner and makes a rounded edge if you don t like stout make a beer by using yellow yarn instead of black this pattern uses american crochet terms/stitches disclaimer my dog played with his for a week before he sat down with it tore a hole in it and pulled out all the stuffing don t let your pet play with the toy if it is showing wear or developing holes don t let your pet eat the stuffing or yarn it is bad for them abbreviations bpdc back post double fpdc front post double crochet crochet chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch decrease decrease crochet guinness dog toy pattern by ann mcclure creative commons attribution- noncommercial-share alike 3 0 license crochet guinness dog toy by ann mcclure 2 of 2 pattern work through back loops unless otherwise indicated with black chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 work 6 single_crochet in ring round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 4 work 1 round even round 5 *work 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet work 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 36 double_crochet round 6 work one fpdc in each double_crochet around this turns the corner rounds 7-15 continuing in double_crochet working through back loops work 9 rounds even or to desired height rounds 16 and 17 change to white and work 2 rounds even or desired depth of head if you stop now you have a funky cozy or keep going to close the top round 18 work bpdc around round 19 *work 1 double_crochet decrease 1 double_crochet repeat from * around 24 double_crochet round 20 work one round even stuff it if you haven t already round 21 switch to single_crochet and decrease every double_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 22 decrease every single_crochet around 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in the stitch across to close the gap fasten_off give it to your dog as a toy and watch it be rejected ungrateful furball crochet guinness dog toy pattern by ann mcclure creative commons attribution- noncommercial-share alike 3 0 license
